channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Welcome to the blog!
item.description:
So. Another blog, eh? Well, this is another blog. Mostly about tech, programming, (ramblings about) design, and other stuff. I’ll be using this as a sort of log while I’m learning new stuff.

I think the first series might just be about how I made this blog using Hugo and CSS3 flex-boxes. (yes, most of this site is flex-box. Sorry ie(<10) users. If you can even read this that is)

I’m just a amateur programmer and dabbler at design, who has yet got a lot to learn, from Kolkata. I hope you’ll strap along for the ride as well!
